Name: Smoky Tears cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Best described as being a mezcal, mastiha and pink grapefruit Margarita. It’s a great combo. Mastiha freshness with a hint of smoky mezcal is balanced by slightly acidic pink grapefruit juice.
Nutrition: One serving of Smoky Tears cocktail contains 203 calories
